posts.postText:
What's the damage amount per bullet for the weapons in TTT? 

Excluding upgrade factors
I can tell you betrayel USED to be 90000000000000000000, and knife is about 2000
My mac 10 does about 18-24 i think, fully upgraded
Without upgades, like normal damage.. I even asked for that specifically but thanks
It depends where you hit and what weapon you use.
Get someone to test it in game and tell the admin / moderator your doing it so it wont be considered rdm.

>> Get someone to test it in game and tell the admin / moderator your doing it so it wont be considered rdm. 

There's no one answer. All weapons do different damage and all hitzones do different damage.
Theres only one thing thats for sure, a perfect headshot. 200 damage.

>> >> Get someone to test it in game and tell the admin / moderator your doing it so it wont be considered rdm. 

There's no one answer. All weapons do different damage and all hitzones do different damage.
Theres only one thing thats for sure, a perfect headshot. 200 damage. 

There has to be an answer. Thats why I'm saying test it. Hit each part of the body from front and back and damagelog it.

If its like counter strike 1.6, each part has a different dmg and is always constant.
Mac10s do like 15 damage for a body shot.
